info.short_description: Instance autogestita in lingua italiana. Principalmente focalizzata sull'informazione.
info.full_description:
[it] E' un social network indipendente. L'amministrazione tecnica e' supportata dal collettivo bida. Per maggiori informazioni leggi il nostro manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

[en]It is an independent social network. Technical administration is supported by the bida collective. For more information read our manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

info.short_description: foxes and fox-like creatures
info.full_description: The Vulpine Club is a community for foxes and their associates, friends, fans, and other furry (and non-furry) creatures. We're pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

info.short_description: A queer community of monsters, creatures, and lovers of strangeness.
info.full_description:
Monsterpit is a small, friendly, and very queer community of monster and creature lovers.

We provide a relaxing space for folks to embrace strangeness with a love that spans from casual admiration to kinky teratophile.

Through monsters, we can express queer identity, sexuality, and spirituality in a world that often fears us.

Whether you love the strange or are the strange, you'll find a home here.
info.topic: monsters, creatures, queer, kink, art, roleplay, general

info.short_description: Unixcorns project instance https://unixcorn.org, mostly french speaking

info.short_description: We welcome all LGBT+ people and allies all around the world! :)
info.full_description: We welcome all LGBT+ people and allies all around the world! We want to make this a friendly place and we try our best to help members out if they ever need. :)

info.short_description: Instance Mastodon francophone et avec une modÃ©ration active. Mostly French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.
info.full_description:

info.short_description: Plural CafÃ© is a community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike.
info.full_description: Welcome to the Plural CafÃ©! Grab a hot cocoa or coffee from the bar, kick back and relax. This is a Mastodon instance that is focused around fostering a friendly and welcoming community for plural systems and plural-friendly singlets alike. The primary goal is to provide a sense of support and community around plural systems.

info.short_description: A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region.
info.full_description:
A community centered on the Twin Cities of Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota, and their surrounding region.

A home for diaspora of other social networks that have connected people in the region in the past, that have either died away or driven users off with unethical or anti-social policies.
info.topic: Minneapolis and St. Paul, Minnesota social, political, and regional concerns (and the lives of those concerned)

info.short_description: A community for those who have none.
info.full_description:
A place for the marginalized, those pushed out of society, the wretched of the earth. 

We can be your home. Your place of comfort and solace. 

Everyone is welcome, but our priorities are for those who need the most community and most help.

info.short_description: For Linux lovers, users, sysadmins; and the like. Welcome!
info.full_description: For Linux lovers, users, sysadmins; and the like. Welcome!

info.short_description:
Bienvenu !
Instance gÃ©nÃ©raliste lÃ¨gÃ¨rement orientÃ© photographie et trollage en tout genre.
info.full_description: Ce serveur hÃ©berge une instance de Mastodon, mÃ©dia de micro-blogging libre et dÃ©centralisÃ©. Vous pouvez vous inscrire ici pour partager avec les autres membres, ainsi que les membres des autres instances, automatiquement.

info.short_description: A small instance in Germany with no specific topic.
info.full_description:
A small instance with the aim to connect people to the fediverse, especially those who are switching from e.g. twitter to Mastodon. We provide a generalistic instance for everybody to join.

For people who are used to Twitter's look and feel, we provide a Halcyon-Instance to make the transition even more fun and seamlessly.

info.short_description: A general-purpose instance for all kinds of cool LGBTQ people and allies!
info.full_description:
Rules:

    No Harassment
    No porn without Content Warnings. Additionally, no porn that may be considered illegal in the United States or Europe.
    No racism, sexism, homophobia, or transphobia.
    No toots that incite violence.
    Please do not host bots on this instance. Bots are better off in another instance, such as botsin.space.
    Avatars and usernames must be kept appropriate.
    Content Warnings are expected on anything graphic, including text. Things that would normally be required to be CW'd in a toot may not be posted in bios, avatars, cover images, or display names.
    No piracy or links to piracy.
    Don't be a dick; respect your fellow users.
    Have fun!

info.short_description:
This mastodon instance is a fetish based instance based on a various list of fetishes.
Giantess, giant, vore, crush and more!
info.full_description:
A social place for bugs of all kind to fantasize about the many things larger than them!

This mastodon instance is a fetish based instance based on a various list of fetishes.
Giantess, giant, vore, crush and more!

From enthusiasts to artist, all are welcome!

Are you one of the "tall ones"? The ones above the bugs?
You are welcome to! Come say hi, maybe even walk with us!

Just watch your step, not all of us enjoy being stepped on ;)

info.short_description:
Erste Mastodon Instanz in MÃ¼nchen (Bayern) fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten".
First Mastodon Instance in Munich (Bavaria, Germany).
info.full_description:
German: Erste Mastodon Instanz fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchnerinnen, MÃ¼nchner und alle "Zuagroasten" ;) Hier ist jeder Willkommen. Ich mÃ¶chte Euch mit frei.social eine sichere Anlaufstelle bieten, um unbeschwert zu trÃ¶ten und dass Ihr Mastodon bequem und einfach nutzen kÃ¶nnt. Die Server fÃ¼r frei.social stehen in Deutschland und Euere Daten werden nicht weiterverwertet. NatÃ¼rlich ist die Verbindung zu den Servern verschlÃ¼sselt und es werden tÃ¤glich angelegt. So wie es sich gehÃ¶rt. 
Ich wÃ¼nsche Euch viel Spass mit frei.social und wenn Ihr Lust habt, trÃ¶tet mich einfach mal an :)

English: First munich mastodon instance. I would like to provide you with a secure place with frei.social. There is no special topic here, I just want to give you the opportunity that you can use Mastodon convenient and easy and you know where your data is. The servers for frei.social are located in Germany.
Have Fun, and if you like, send me a toot :)
